attr.title: Upaon: A Snake's Journey
attr.desc: Help this sympathetic Snake on her journey to the hidden treasure, solve puzzles that mix mechanics of the classic game Snake with Sokoban
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1660040/Upaon_A_Snakes_Journey/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.
